Title: The Warning
Writer: Patxi Amezcua (adaptation), Chris Sparling (screenplay by), Jorge Guerricaechevarría (based on the screenplay by), Paul Pen (based on the novel by)
Actors: Raúl Arévalo, Aura Garrido, Hugo Arbues, Belén Cuesta
Plot: Ten-year-old Nico receives a threatening letter and now his life is in danger. No one seems to believe him except one person that he doesn't know who has come to believe that fate itself wants the boy dead and tries to prevent it.
